original_text: When a gentle south wind began to blow, they saw their opportunity; so they weighed anchor and sailed along the shore of Crete.
korean_text: 남풍이 순하게 불매 그들이 뜻을 이룬 줄 알고 닻을 감아 그레데 해변을 끼고 항해하더니

sentences.original_text: When a gentle south wind began to blow
sentences.korean_translation: 부드러운 남쪽 바람이 불기 시작했을 때

sentences.original_text: and sailed along the shore of Crete
